ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] [OT] Fascinating Article (discussion)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Stacey [mailto:selene1212@yahoo.com] Sent: February 15, 2002 3:16 PM Subject: RE: [eqbards] [OT] Fascinating Article (discussion) (Gasp!! I m a woman
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Stacey [mailto:selene1212@...]
Sent: February 15, 2002 3:16 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] [OT] Fascinating Article (discussion)

(Gasp!! I'm a woman & I'm interested in "D&D"
type games... whoa, wait a minute... my main is
also a warrior... I bet this guy would think this
says something about MY sexuality. Maybe I
secretly want to be a man... lol... I think
not!!)

/snip
Im not sure if you are referring to me or the author of the article, but I
have nothing against women playing eq, I'm all for it, wish I could get my
wife to play, but alas, its not gonna happen. I was just saying that I know
many people have had social problems due to eq, for example I know a guy
back on sol ro that lost his job, his wife and sold his jaguar so that he
could play eq (moron). Even myself sometimes the wife faction drops due to
playing hours, those 3-6 hours raids are painful, I only do those when she's
working. But I also know where to draw the line. Real life is more important
to me then phat gear. And you being into D&D games, I envy ya, I wish my
wife was too, but she's not much into that era/medieval stuff, she more
high-fi. If ya met someone in eq then I wish ya nothing but good times, but
I know that many have suffered more then people who have gained. But there
are lotsa "interesting people playing eq, and this topic has come up on the
Ayonae Ro boards. Its rather pathetic how some people act online.

Oh and the eq boxes, they're a joke to me, i remember one time i bought one
and brought it into the office instead of leaving it in the car, so I could
read the manual or something during the afternoon (beats playin freecell)
and a lady in my department made a comment something of the sort "oh i bet
you really like that outfit blah blah blah". It really pissed me off, i
just looked at her and told her very sarcasticly something like "ya they
really get me going". Come on people, I been playin since beta 3, before
that it was uo. I play cause I like rpg stuff, not cause some dork artist
doest get out of the office enough.

Check this thread out, it pretty much sums it up...
http://pub42.ezboard.com/fayonaerofrm6.showMessage?topicID=833.topic


-Minkin
